name: Tempus Bound
description:
As a mysterious bushbaby/owl/fox hybrid it's your mission to scramble across the world of wind temples. reaching the checkpoint as fast as you can is the aim. Compete with other players' highscores online.

Please don't play in Firefox (use Chrome or download) for leaderboards.

Arrowkeys to move

Press TAB  to randomly select from themes.

Enter is Start.



Please follow me on Twitter or here for further updates: @Jasonsumm
